name: The adventure of Geff the pickled roast beef flavored potato action figurine
name_original: The adventure of Geff the pickled roast beef flavored potato action figurine
description:
You are a potato named Geff. Your job is to avoid the spikes, and reach the right side of your screen for EPIC points. Laws of physics are more like suggestions, dont fear them.

IMPORTANT: the first time you play, you will have to reload the tab for the player and enemies to properly load. Every time you buy an item from the shop, you should reload after. I don't know why it's happening and if you have a fix, please let me know, but for now reloading is required after every purchase, and once the first time you play
